---+!! %IF{ "$'URLPARAM{reporttype}'='Sa'" then="Area Coordinators" }%%IF{  "$'URLPARAM{reporttype}'='Pi'" then="PI"}%%IF{ "$'URLPARAM{reporttype}'=''" then="View the"}% Reports for %IF{ "$'URLPARAM{reporttype}'='Sa' or $'URLPARAM{reporttype}'='Pi'" then="Q%REPORTQUARTER%" else="Selected Quarter"}% %URLPARAM{ "reportyear" default="" }%
This topic aggregates all quarterly reports from all area coordinators.


<div><form name="rewrite" action="%SCRIPTURL%/view/%WEB%/%TOPIC%">
Choose the report type, year and quarter you wish to display:

|  *TYPE:* | <select name="reporttype" id="reportType"><option value="">Select...</option><option value="Pi">PI</option><option value="Sa">Area Coord.</option></select> |
|  *YEAR:* | <select name="reportyear" id="reportYear"><option value="%REPORTYEAR%">%REPORTYEAR%</option><option value="2007">2007</option><option value="2008">2008</option><option value="2009">2009</option><option value="2010">2010</option><option value="2011">2011</option><option value="2012">2012</option></select> |
|  *QUARTER* | <select name="reportquarter" id="reportQuarter"><option value="%REPORTQUARTER%">%REPORTQUARTER%</option><option value="1">1</option><option value="2">2</option><option value="3">3</option><option value="4">4</option></select> |
|  | <input type="submit" value="Get report" /> |
</form></div>

----
